Comments_List: I learned how to read both reviews and primary literature in many different fields, of which I was mostly unaware of. I learned how to write in depth about each topic and learned how to think about next experiments.
I learned a survey of the current questions in Immunology.

Strengths -- level of engagement and discourse
Weakness -- inconvenient time
I would recommend this course. This course forced the students to think beyond assigned materials in order to give insightful responses.
Yes, each week you learn new things, and it is great to converse with experts in the field on their topic of interest.
